io.libraft.agent.configuration
Class RaftConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  io.libraft.agent.configuration.RaftConfiguration

public final class RaftConfiguration
extends Object

Represents the top-level configuration for libraft-agent. Contains the following properties/blocks:

  • rpcTimeout
  • minElementTimeout
  • additionalElectionTimeoutRange
  • heartbeatInterval
  • connectTimeout
  • minReconnectInterval
  • additionalReconnectIntervalRange
  • database
  • cluster
All timeouts and intervals are specified in milliseconds.

See the project README.md for more on the configuration.

getRPCTimeout

public int getRPCTimeout()
Get the Raft RPC timeout.

This value defines how long a Raft implementation will wait for the response to a RPC request.

Returns:
rpc timeout value >= 0

setRPCTimeout

public void setRPCTimeout(int rpcTimeout)
Set the Raft RPC timeout.

Parameters:
rpcTimeout - rpc timeout value > 0
See Also:
getRPCTimeout()

getMinElectionTimeout

public int getMinElectionTimeout()
Get the minimum Raft election timeout.

This value defines how long a Raft follower will wait for a valid AppendEntries message from the leader before holding a new election. The actual election timeout is defined as: 

     minElectionTimeout + randomInRange(0, additionElectionTimeoutRange)

Returns:
minimum election timeout value >= 0
See Also:
getAdditionalElectionTimeoutRange()

setMinElectionTimeout

public void setMinElectionTimeout(int minElectionTimeout)
Set the minimum Raft election timeout.

Parameters:
minElectionTimeout - minimum election timeout value > 0
See Also:
getMinElectionTimeout()

public int getAdditionalElectionTimeoutRange()

Returns:
additional election timeout range >= 0

getHeartbeatInterval

public int getHeartbeatInterval()
Get the Raft heartbeat interval.

This value defines the maximum interval between messages from a Raft leader to a Raft follower.

Returns:
heartbeat interval >= 0

public void setHeartbeatInterval(int heartbeatInterval)
Set the Raft heartbeat interval.

Parameters:
heartbeatInterval - heartbeat interval > 0
See Also:
getHeartbeatInterval()

getConnectTimeout

public int getConnectTimeout()
Get the RaftNetworkClient connect timeout.

This value defines the amount of time the local Raft server will wait to establish a connection to another Raft server. If the connection is not established when this time period expires the in-progress connection is torn down and a reconnect attempt is scheduled.

Returns:
connect timeout value >= 0

setConnectTimeout

public void setConnectTimeout(int connectTimeout)
Set the RaftNetworkClient connect timeout.

Parameters:
connectTimeout - connect timeout value > 0
See Also:
getConnectTimeout()

getMinReconnectInterval

public int getMinReconnectInterval()
Get the minimum reconnect interval.

This value defines the minimum amount of time the local Raft server will wait before reconnecting to another Raft server. The actual reconnect interval is defined as: 

     minReconnectInterval + randomInRange(0, additionalReconnectIntervalRange)

Returns:
minimum reconnect interval >= 0
See Also:
getAdditionalElectionTimeoutRange()

setMinReconnectInterval

public void setMinReconnectInterval(int minReconnectInterval)
Set the minimum reconnect interval.

Parameters:
minReconnectInterval - minimum reconnect interval > 0
See Also:
getMinElectionTimeout()
